name: Outbreak 1-3 players coop with FPS / TPS / RPG and RTS modes
shortName: Outbreak 1-3 players coop with FPS / TPS / RPG and RTS modes
description: Starcraft 2 campaign mission Outbreak with zombies edited for 1-3 players cooperative with FPS/TPS/RPG and RTS modes ## Battle.net EU map name: Outbreak [ FPS TPS RPG RTS ] You can play at any mode - standard RTS and TPS/FPS mode for any unit with RPG upgrades. You can cooperate with your friends and play with both modes - your friend in RTS mode and you in FPS/TPS mode! In the video 3 players (my friendsand me) destroying the waves of zombies :D
author: _ForgeUser1151780
